name: The Grim Stuff (Teaser)
description:
Consider donating! Every donation goes toward improving development of future games and overall quality and improvement!

We here at Owl Nest Studios are proud to present:

The Grim Stuff is a short pixelated horror game about helping out an old bloke in an alley, who "Misplaced" his syringe of Grim while making his way through an abandoned building.

This is a Teaser and is roughly about 5 minutes long, and is meant to give you an idea of what the game will be like on release and to show you some of the things we're working on!
